config.option.description.pushtomeow.meo: §8Art by Pansear, from the Rainworld Pandemonium Emotes Discord!

The sound that plays when using the default meow keybind.

§7Right/shift click to reverse, overwritten if set by server!

§8(Default: Normal)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.mod:
§f§lDefault: §7Play modified sound while modifier key is pressed.
§8§lInverted: §7Play default sound while modifier key is is pressed.
§a§lAlways: §7Always play modified sound.
§c§lNever: §7Never play modified sound.
config.option.description.pushtomeow.pit:
The meow pitch before being optionally adjusted pitch variance and player pitch°.

§8(Default = 1.0)

The random +-variance the default meow pitch gets adjusted by.

§7Adjusting a total sound pitch below 0.5 or above 2.0 will have no effect!

§8(0 = Disabled | Default = 0.1)

The max +-value meow pitch gets adjusted by player pitch°.

§7Adjusting a total sound pitch below 0.5 or above 2.0 will have no effect!

§8(0 = Disabled | Default = 0.25)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.pos:
The max value meow pitch gets adjusted by +player pitch°.

§7Adjusting a total sound pitch below 0.5 or above 2.0 will have no effect!

§8(0 = Disabled | Default = 0.5)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.neg:
The max value meow pitch gets adjusted by -player pitch°.

§7Adjusting a total sound pitch below 0.5 or above 2.0 will have no effect!

§8(0 = Disabled | Default = 0.25)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.pit:
The +-bounds of which meow pitch will be considered default.

§8(Default = 0°)

The +-angle required for meow pitch to be considered max.

§8(Default = 75°)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.whi:
Replaces all meows except those listed here with the normal meow.

§7Overwrites Blacklist! Format as sound id: "pushtomeow:meow.<name>"

§8(Names: coarse, fat, normal, pup, rivulet.a, rivulet.b, sofanthiel, spear, watcher, whispery, altinv.andrew, altinv.inv)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.bla:
Meows that will be replaced by the normal meow.

§7Overwritten by whitelist if it exists! Format as sound id: "pushtomeow:meow.<name>"

§8(Names: coarse, fat, normal, pup, rivulet.a, rivulet.b, sofanthiel, spear, watcher, whispery, altinv.andrew, altinv.inv)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.vol:
The "volume" all meows play at.

§7Values >1 only effect the distance the sound can be heard from. Every 1 volume = ~16 blocks!

§8(Default: 1.5)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.mod:
The volume multiplier applied to modified meows.

§8(Default: 0.75)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.min:
Prevents meow pitch from going below this value.

§8(Default: 0.5)
config.option.description.pushtomeow.max:
Prevents meow pitch from going above this value.

§8(Default: 2.0)
